desmoj.core.dist

Class DistributionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      • desmoj.core.dist.DistributionManager

  • public class DistributionManager
extends NamedObject
    Controls all distributions used during an experiment. Provides the service of automatic seed generation for all distributions registered at the distributionmanager. Note that all distributions register at instantiation time at the experiment's distributionmanager automatically.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistributionManager(java.lang.String name, long seed)
      Creates a new distributionManager with the given name and the given initial seed for the seed-generator.

    • Method Summary

      De-registers a distribution from the experiment.

      Returns a list containing all distributions.
      protected java.lang.Class<? extends UniformRandomGenerator> getRandomNumberGenerator()
      Returns the underlying pseudo random number generator to be used by all distributions.
      long getSeed()
      Returns the initial seed.
      void newSeedAll()
      Provides all registered distributions with new seed values, thus resetting all distribution statistics at the same time.
      long nextSeed()
      Returns a new seed value to be used as an initial seed for registered distributions.
      void register(Distribution dist)
      Registers a new distribution at the experiment to control antithetic mode and set random seed values.
      void resetAll()
      Resets all registered distributions.
      void setAntitheticAll(boolean antitheticMode)
      Sets antithetic mode to true on all registered distributions regardless of their previous status.
      void setRandomNumberGenerator(java.lang.Class<? extends UniformRandomGenerator> randomNumberGenerator)
      Sets the underlying pseudo random number generator to be used by all distributions created from now on.
      void setSeed(long newSeed)
      Sets the seed of the SeedGenerator to the given value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistributionManager

        public DistributionManager(java.lang.String name,
                           long seed)
        Creates a new distributionManager with the given name and the given initial seed for the seed-generator.
        Parameters:
        name - java.lang.String : The distributionmanager's name
        seed - long : The initial seed for the seedgenerator

    • Method Detail

      • deRegister

        public void deRegister(Distribution dist)
        De-registers a distribution from the experiment.
        Parameters:
        dist - desmoj.dist.Distribution : The distribution to be deregistered

      • newSeedAll

        public void newSeedAll()
        Provides all registered distributions with new seed values, thus resetting all distribution statistics at the same time.

      • nextSeed

        public long nextSeed()
        Returns a new seed value to be used as an initial seed for registered distributions.
        Returns:
        long : A new seed value for a registered distribution

      • register

        public void register(Distribution dist)
        Registers a new distribution at the experiment to control antithetic mode and set random seed values.
        Parameters:
        dist - desmoj.dist.Distribution : The distribution to be registered

      • resetAll

        public void resetAll()
        Resets all registered distributions. Just calls all distribution's individual reset method.

      • setAntitheticAll

        public void setAntitheticAll(boolean antitheticMode)
        Sets antithetic mode to true on all registered distributions regardless of their previous status. No reset of statistical counters.
        Parameters:
        antitheticMode - boolean : The new status of antithetic mode

      • setSeed

        public void setSeed(long newSeed)
        Sets the seed of the SeedGenerator to the given value. If the seed is not set here, its default is zero, unless specified in the experimentoptions.
        Parameters:
        newSeed - long : The new seed for the seedgenerator

      • getSeed

        public long getSeed()
        Returns the initial seed.
        Returns:
        long : the initial seed

      • setRandomNumberGenerator

        public void setRandomNumberGenerator(java.lang.Class<? extends UniformRandomGenerator> randomNumberGenerator)
        Sets the underlying pseudo random number generator to be used by all distributions created from now on. The default generator is LinearCongruentialRandomGenerator; any other generator to be used must implement the interface UniformRandomGenerator.
        Parameters:
        randomNumberGenerator - Class : The random number generator class to be used
        See Also:
        LinearCongruentialRandomGenerator, UniformRandomGenerator

      • getRandomNumberGenerator

        protected java.lang.Class<? extends UniformRandomGenerator> getRandomNumberGenerator()
        Returns the underlying pseudo random number generator to be used by all distributions. This method is intended for internal use (i.e. called by Distribution) only.
        See Also:
        LinearCongruentialRandomGenerator, MersenneTwisterRandomGenerator, UniformRandomGenerator

      • getDistributions

        public java.util.List<Distribution> getDistributions()
        Returns a list containing all distributions.
